attributes.action: There is no mandate now to be in the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Back in the 70s Edward Heath sold the EU by telling this nation lies stating the EU would be for trade only now 30 years down the line it totally for from that.Its time for the goverment now to take the burden and investigate the lies the the goverment back then told the nation and make public all the files with the facts showing what edaward heath really knew about the european project.The goverment now should old there hands up and call a referendrum

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
